Template.subject: Admission Confirmation Notification (TODDEN-AIS)
Template.Mailbody:
Dear Mr & Mrs.@@lastName@@

We are pleased to inform you that after discussions we had during the interaction session,@@firstName@@ has been selected for admission in TODDEN-AIS - for @@admissionGrade@@ 2016-17

We take this opportunity to congratulate your child warmly, on securing a place in TODDEN-AIS .We are confident that we will be able to provide  a stimulating and challenging learning environment at the school.

We  now seek your cooperation in ensuring that our admission process is completed as quickly as possible. To complete the admission process, we request you to kindly submit the following:

1.      The Admission acceptance form( attached herein )duly signed  by both parents and

2.      The payment of fees as per the schedule .(attached herein)

Please note that the last date to pay the fees will be  Thursday 17th  October 2015  after which it will be presumed that you are not interested in getting your child admitted to TODDEN-AIS

We regret that request for extension will not be entertained.

The fees are to be paid in the school office between 8:30 am  and 1:00 p.m.

 

 Thanking you

Mrs Shivangi Panchal
Executive Director
Administration
